settings.heading: Get In Touch
settings.content: If you have any questions for us, please don't hesitate to get in touch. We'd love to help you find the perfect outfit! All e-mail inquiries will be responded to within 1-2 business days. Please be sure to check your spam/junk folder in the case you do not see a response from us.
settings.text: Our Customer Service hours are: Monday – Friday / 9 AM – 5 PM EST.
settings.title: Contact Us
settings.note: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
